subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The N.H.L.’s chief operating officer, John Collins, and the Capitals’ owner, Ted Leonsis, formally announced that the Winter Classic would be held in Washington in 2015.
snippet: The N.H.L.’s chief operating officer, John Collins, and the Capitals’ owner, Ted Leonsis, formally announced that the Winter Classic would be held in Washington in 2015.
